name: Collocation network
disambiguatingDescription: Network of linked collocations that starts with an initial node (N1) around which a set of first-order collocates is identified.
description: Network of linked collocations that starts with an initial node (N1) around which a set of first-order collocates is identified. Any of these collocates can be considered a new node with a new set of collocates, and the process can be repeated multiple times to create an extensive network.
